snippet.title: Microcosmum: survival of cells - Official Trailer 2015
snippet.description:
Title: Microcosmum: survival of cells

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/386260

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...

Ios: https://itunes.apple.com/ru/app/micro...

Windows Phone: https://www.windowsphone.com/ru-ru/st...

Join the wonderful and amazing world of microorganisms. Become part of a natural selection in the microcosm. Enjoy the atmospheric music and this beautiful world. Relaxing gameplay and the whole atmosphere will let you lose yourself in the game. The freedom of control will let you create a large amount of different strategic manoeuvres. Become the only winner in this battle for survival.

The aim is to catch all your opponents. Improve your microorganisms to make them stronger. Attack and catch your opponents using parts of your microorganisms. You start the game being on equal rights with your opponents. Your way to victory lies through the circumspected strategy.
